td.content: s:pt presents with critical poor appetite of 7 days duration together with critical weight loss, critical cough with greenish sputum. he is a 26 YO male inker. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life drinks daily o:Height 169 cm, Weight 70.1 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Leukemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to hematology.

td.content: s:a 27 yo white m inker presents with critical cough with greenish sputum, critical weight loss. patient also reports of critical poor appetite. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 70.9 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Leukemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to hematology.

s:white male inker aged 27 Ys presents with critical weight loss, critical cough with greenish sputum and critical poor appetite. These symptoms are present for about 4 weeks. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 71 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Leukemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and ordered Bone marrow biopsy.
